name: Gastly

attacks.name: Sleeping Gas
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Destiny Bond
attacks.text: Discard 1 Psychic Energy card attached to Gastly in order to use this attack. If a Pokémon Knocks Out Gastly during your opponent's next turn, Knock Out that Pokémon.

flavorText: Almost invisible, this gaseous Pokémon cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice. LV. 8 #92

strengths: Zero retreat cost provides complete mobility
No weakness makes it resistant to type-based strategies
Fighting resistance (-30) provides excellent defense against Fighting types
Sleeping Gas can lock down opponents with sleep status
Destiny Bond provides powerful deterrent against attacking Gastly
Evolves into Haunter and eventually Gengar
weaknesses: Extremely low 30 HP makes it very fragile
Sleeping Gas relies on coin flip (50% chance)
Destiny Bond requires discarding Psychic energy
Cannot contribute to taking prize cards through damage alone
synergies: Energy Retrieval recovers discarded Psychic energy from Destiny Bond
Gust of Wind can force opponent to keep sleeping Pokemon active
Defender makes opponents think twice about attacking with Destiny Bond active
Pokemon Breeder allows skipping Haunter to evolve straight to Gengar
counters: Status removal cards like Full Heal
Pokemon that can attack from the bench
